participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: caring, nurturing, and optimistic. I enjoy inspiring my students and spending time with my pets.
participant_1.background: i work as a school teacher. i've a dogs. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i am a woman. i attend church every week.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: playful, wise, and adventurous. I have a zest for life and enjoy sharing stories from my past.
participant_2.background: i feel like i might live forever. i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.
